page.title: 17MALBOROUGH'S ROADS
page.content: Roads in this area are very winding, even the main roads. The{Lower Town road is quite rough because some chippings are loose. The main roads are quite smooth because of all the traffic that has worn them down. We went to{Mace}shop and we did a survey to see what people thought about the roads.We asked twenty people if they thought that they preferred country lanes to main roads and if they thought that there should be more roads in this area. Thirteen people preferred country lanes to main roads. Only four people liked main roads better than country lanes. Nobody wanted any more roads in this area. Somebody wanted a oneway system in {Malborough. Mrs Cole }wanted less traffic so that you could get around more easily.
